string-array.name: long_short_labels
string-array.item: Long press to open, short press for details
Short press to open, long press for details

resources.string: PageTurner is free software under the GPL v3.
Your access-key is invalid. Please visit pageturner-reader.org to obtain a valid access key.
What kind of site would you like to add?
PageTurner is a syncing e-book reader that allows you to sync your reading progress over multiple devices.
Could not download the book. Please try again.
Could not connect to the sync server.
Copy books to my library folder
Your own OPDS / Calibre sites. You can add sites from the Preferences screen.
Sorry, it looks like the link you clicked is broken.
Download complete.\nThe book has been added to your library
The feed was empty. Please check that you are using the correct URL.
End of chapter.\nClick here to continue.
Cloud sync is currently disabled. To enable it, please enter an e-mail address in the preferences.
Could not contact the site. Please try again.
You can either scan your entire SD-Card, or specify a folder to search.
Some files had errors while importing:
Please install OI File Manager from the Google Play Store.
The new language setting will become active the next time you open a book.
No books were found on your device.\nYou can download books at gutenberg.org or feedbooks.com
No books were found on your device.\nWould you like to download some books?
You don\'t have any custom sites defined. Please add some in the preferences.
The scan did not find any new books.
You don\'t have any cloud-sync points stored yet.\nSync points are stored automatically when you leave PageTurner.
This highlight has an attached text note.\nAre you sure you to delete it?
Sorry, PageTurner could not free enough memory to load this file.
Allows you to connect to OPDS sites which use self-signed certificates.
An access key is required to use the synchronization service. Visit the site to learn how to get a key.
Allow PageTurner to send anonymous error reports when it crashes.
Allow the book to set colours
PageTurner will always start in the last read book instead of last open screen.
Connect to your own Calibre library
Should PageTurner copy files to its own library folder
Please enter a name for this device.
Unique name for this device, for conflict resolution.
Dims the System UI buttons when reading in fullscreen mode.
Please enter a valid e-mail address
Used to sync your progress across devices. Leave blank to disable syncing.
The size of the font used for displaying books.
Prevents the screen from locking while reading
Allows you to switch PageTurner\'s language settings.
Adds extra vertical space between lines.
How to open books in the library
Add and remove custom online catalogs and Calibre servers.
Space on the left and right edge of the screen.
Space on the top and bottom edge of the screen.
Tap the left/right edge of the screen to change pages.
Tap the top/bottom edge of the screen to change pages.
Press volume up/down to change pages.
How should the buttons on the side of the Nook turn the page?
Read left to right or right to left (Hebrew and Arabic)
Font to use if a book requests a Sans-Serif font.
Allows you to lock the screen orientation
How many seconds a page will be displayed.
Font to use if a book requests a Serif font.
Shows page numbers while reading. It may take a few seconds for page numbers to be displayed the first time.
Please enter a sync server url.
Select which server you would like to sync with.
Allow the book to change fonts, colours, etc.
There are no books in your library.\nWould you like to scan your device for books?
Search did not find any matches.
